title: Property Development Loan - LAI00001829
description: Existing borrower requesting funds to assist with the next phase of the build of three dwellings, these plots also make up the security. Term: to 30/11/2025

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001811
description: New loan to repay existing Folk2Folk loan of £120k and add additional funds for fees - secured on 18 acres of pastureland, a farmhouse and a range of farm buildings in North Devon. Term: 2 years.

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001827
description: Loan to cover cost of developing farm to fork property which will consist of butchers and café/takeaway. Various parcels of land - 157 arable acres, 32 woodland acres and site of new development to be security. Term to 06/09/2026

title: Business Expansion Loan - LAI00001821
description: To enable various farm improvements and alterations to planning permissions to be undertaken. Enable purchase of property for renovation. Security to be c130 acres pastureland, Cornwall. Term 5 years.

title: Property Development Loan - LAI00001817
description: Next tranche of development funding to continue with the development site which is security for the loan. Term to 10th November 2025.

title: Property Renovation Loan - LAI00001806
description: Loan to refurbish commercial property located in Penzance into a coffee house. The property being offered as security is on the main high street of Penzance. Term: 5 years

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001812
description: To provide some working capital to be used for interest cover until Easter. Security is 28 bed hotel and 4 bed owners bungalow, Cornwall.

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001815
description: Refinance for current F2F borrower with additional funds to further expand the business, the security is 8.8-acres of land with a 4-bedroom barn conversion, a 2-bedroom flat, 28 kennels and various outbuildings. Term: 5 years

title: Business Expansion Loan - LAI00001809
description: To assist with the various aspects of planning and design for a potential development which is also the security in Kingsteignton, Devon. Term: 1 year

title: Development Project Loan - LAI00001814
description: To continue the building of 3 new properties plus new road to site. Land with planning permission, plus 3 completed holiday lets to be security. Situated in Portwrinkle, Cornwall. Term: to 08/01/2027

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001807
description: Refinance of an existing Folk2Folk Loan, with additional funds to cover fees - security is a 7-bedroom hotel in Cheltenham. Term: 4 years

title: Refinance Loan LAI0001808
description: Refinance of an existing FOLK2FOLK loan to enable the completion of a barn conversion. Secured by four properties. Term: 1 year

title: Property Development Loan LAI-00001823
description: To assist the borrower with the development of a residential dwelling in the county of Lancashire which will be our security. Term to July 2026.

title: Refinance Loan LAI-00001818
description: New loan to repay existing Folk2Folk loans of £100k plus an additional £50k to repay external debt and £10k for the set-up costs of this loan. Secured on c3 acre site including a barn which is a holiday let, tennis courts and an additional holiday let. Term 2 years.

title: Property Development Loan LAI-00001825
description: Previously borrowed from Folk2Folk. To repay existing debt and continue the development of new houses at the site. Security is land with planning permission. Term 2 years.

title: Property Renovation Loan LAI-00001826
description: Tranche loans to assist with the next phase of barn conversions as first phase now complete, these barns and a parcel of adjacent land, make up the security, in Hayle, Cornwall. Term: Until Sept. 2026

title: Refinance Loan - LAI00001813
description: Renewal of loan used to assist with the purchase of the security property; a 3-bedroom farmhouse and 2 agricultural barns set within 12 acres of pastureland. The borrower is applying for planning to convert the two barns and will then sell to a developer. Term: 2 years.

title: Property Development Loan - LAI00001828
description: Tranche loan development funding of up to £12M is requested to fund the acquisition of the development site and subsequent development of 138 dwellings prior to sale of completed properties. Term to 10/11/2025

title: Business Expansion Loan - LAI00001810
description: Further Advance to provide funds for potential new planning. Security to be 114-acre tenanted farm land Bedfordshire. Term: 3 years
